comments.author: Cococoin_pow
comments.body: Thank you for your support with setting up mining pools.

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Coco (COCO) to http://zpool.ca/algo/scrypt. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine scrypt and get paid in COCO:Code:-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://scrypt.mine.zpool.ca:3433 -u COCO_ADDRESS -p c=COCO Exchange to BTC:Code:-a scrypt -o stratum+tcp://scrypt.mine.zpool.ca:3433 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for scrypt: 53433==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_
